app.name: TousAntiCovid
onboarding.welcomeController.title: Welcome
onboarding.welcomeController.mainMessage: Receive alerts and alert others about possible exposure to COVID-19

Use TousAntiCovid to help fight the pandemic by reducing the risk of transmission.


This application was created in collaboration with the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√© (French Ministry of Solidarity and Health) and Sant√© Publique France with regard to health and medical recommendations.
onboarding.explanationsController.title: It‚Äôs easy!
onboarding.explanationsController.stepFo: TousAntiCovid uses your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection to detect other users‚Äô phones that are close to yours.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepIn: You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepBe: Protect your loved ones and everybody else

If you have tested positive for COVID-19, your positive test result will come with a code to be scanned or entered manually, or, alternatively, you will be given a code by whoever performed the test. You can use this code to send anonymous alerts to users who have been in contact with you.
onboarding.privacyController.title: Confidentiality
onboarding.proximityController.title: Detection
onboarding.proximityController.mainMessa:
TousAntiCovid needs to use your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection in order to work.
No location data will be shared or recorded.
onboarding.beAwareController.title: Notifications
onboarding.beAwareController.mainMessage: Receive a push notification if you have been exposed

You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
onboarding.gesturesController.title: Don‚Äôt forget!
onboarding.gesturesController.mainMessag: Social distancing measures are vitally important
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture2: Cough or sneeze into your elbow or into a tissue
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture3: Use single-use tissues and throw them in the bin
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture4: Avoid shaking hands, hugs and kisses
onboarding.batteryController.title: Battery use
onboarding.batteryController.mainMessage: TousAntiCovid needs to run as a background app.
To enable TousAntiCovid to run as a background app, deactivate battery optimisation for TousAntiCovid only.
declareController.message.testedPositive: You have tested positive for COVID-19 and you want to identify yourself in the app

You should have received an email, text or letter containing a QR code sent by the SI-DEP platform (not from your laboratory), provided your contact details were correctly entered at the time of the test.
You can either access this QR code directly by clicking on the link or scanning it into the app, or you can access it manually by entering the 32-character code located below the QR code.
myHealthController.message.youHaveSympto:
Do you want to know what to do?
This questionnaire can guide you.
myHealthController.message.cured.title: If you are not ill
myHealthController.message.cured.subtitl: Your COVID-19 test is negative. Report this by tapping the button below:
myHealthController.state.nothing.title: You have not been exposed to any users who have tested positive for COVID-19
myHealthController.state.nothing.subtitl: Remember to follow social distancing measures and health guidelines
myHealthController.state.contact.title: In the last few days, you have been exposed to one or more users who have tested positive for COVID-19 and you are now a high-risk potential contact
myHealthController.state.contact.subtitl: Self-isolate, contact your doctor to inform them that you have been identified as an at-risk contact and get tested with priority access. Do not contact the French National Health Insurance - they will be in touch with you if the person who has tested positive knows you. To find out how long to self-isolate for, go to the app home page.
myHealthController.state.deleteNotificat: Are you sure you want to temporarily hide your status?
sharingController.title: Share
sharingController.mainMessage.title: The more of us who use TousAntiCovid, the better protected we will be
sharingController.mainMessage.subtitle: We need you. How effective this app is in combating COVID-19 depends on you! Please share it with your friends and family.
sharingController.appSharingMessage: I‚Äôm using TousAntiCovid to fight the pandemic: to send and receive alerts. You should install the app too: https://bonjour.tousanticovid.gouv.fr/
aboutController.title: About
aboutController.mainMessage.title: About TousAntiCovid
aboutController.mainMessage.subtitle:
This app was developed by the TousAntiCovid team under the supervision of the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health and the Secretary of State for Digital Affairs.
The TousAntiCovid team: Inria, the French National Cybersecurity Agency, Capgemini, Dassault Syst√®mes, Inserm, Lunabee Studio, the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health, Orange, Public Health France and Withings.

myHealthController.step.isolate.atRisk.s: Please limit the number of people you are in contact with. Make sure you strictly adhere to social distancing guidelines.
Please follow social distancing guidelines in order to help slow down the spread of the virus
myHealthController.step.beCareful.atRisk: Keep a close eye on the appearance of symptoms
If you are in any doubt, go to My Covid Advice and complete the guidance questionnaire, or contact your doctor.
myHealthController.step.appointment.titl: Call your doctor and get tested
myHealthController.step.appointment.subt: Call your doctor and get tested today with priority access. If you don't have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call)

enterCodeController.mainMessage.title: Please enter the code you were sent by the SI-DEP with the results of your test (below your QR code) or by the person who performed your test (6-character code valid for 1 hour).
enterCodeController.mainMessage.subtitle: These codes are randomly assigned and do not contain any personal information.

scanCodeController.explanation: Hold your phone next to the QR code printed on your test results (this code is anonymous and does not contain any personal information)

common.needLocalisationAccessToScan: The app needs access to your location in order to be able to scan neighbouring devices

common.error.server: A lot of you have joined TousAntiCovid. Thank you! We're doing everything we can to get back online very soon.

sendHistoryController.mainMessage.title: Save lives by joining the citizens‚Äô fight against COVID-19
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.subtit:
Anonymously sharing your "Bluetooth contacts" will help to break the chain of transmission and to save lives.

By sending this information, I authorise TousAntiCovid to store it on the server for 14 days.
sendHistoryController.dontSend.alert.mes: Your decision is final. Are you sure that you don‚Äôt want to send your "Bluetooth contacts"?

myHealthController.sick.mainMessage.subt:
Here are the health recommendations.

Make sure you follow self-isolation guidelines in order to stop the spread of the virus.

Call your doctor if you have any doubts regarding the progress of the disease. If you don't have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call).

 If you are having trouble breathing, call 15 immediately (or 114 for the hearing impaired).

But you can still help in the fight against COVID-19 by sharing this app. The more people use it, the more effective it will be.
Tell your friends and family!

myHealthController.covidAdvices.subtitle: Find personalised advice about prevention and care by going to the "My Covid Advice" website. "My Covid Advice" is a service provided by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.

myHealthController.notification.title: Risk alert
myHealthController.notification.subtitle:
You will be notified if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19 (exposure within one metre lasting 15 minutes or more). Your status will be checked every 24h.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.

infoCenterController.noInternet.subtitle: In order to get the latest news, you must be connected to the internet.
widget.noStatus.info: Your status will be displayed here (updated once a day)

info.notification.newsAvailable.body: TousAntiCovid provides news, facts and figures about COVID-19. Check it out now!
notification.channel.news.title: News
proximityController.error.batchLocalisat: With your smartphone and this version of Android, deactivating Android location data may disrupt the Bluetooth connection used by TousAntiCovid.
home.activationExplanation: Activating TousAntiCovid will keep you informed and inform others about the risk of infection, allowing you to play your part in the fight against COVID-19.
home.infoSection.title: News
home.declareSection.title: Report test result
home.declareSection.cellTitle: Have you tested positive for COVID-19?
home.sharingSection.title: Share test result
home.sharingSection.cellTitle: The more of us use it, the better protected we will all be
home.moreSection.title: More
home.healthSection.title: My health
home.healthSection.noContact.cellSubtitl: Tap here for advice, to find out where to get tested and more
keyfigure.registered.label: Net activations
keyfigure.registered.description: The number of people who have downloaded and activated the app since 2nd June 2020.
keyfigure.notification.label: Notified by the application
keyfigure.notification.description: The number of people notified by the app following exposure to COVID-19 since 2nd June 2020.
keyfigure.qrcodes.label: Reported cases of COVID-19
keyfigure.qrcodes.description: The number of users to have been reported as having tested positive for COVID-19 in the app (since 2nd June 2020).
keyfigure.reffectif.label: R number
keyfigure.reffectif.description: The reproduction number for the virus is updated once a week: this is the average number of people that someone with the virus will infect. If the R number is above 1, the epidemic will spread; if it is below 1, the epidemic will stop spreading. This indicator, which is recorded on Tuesdays and updated on Thursdays, reflects the epidemiological situation roughly 7 days previously and should be interpreted in light of testing and the available data.
keyfigure.tauxincidence.label: Incidence rate
keyfigure.tauxincidence.description: The incidence rate is the number of people to have tested positive (RT-PCR and antigen tests) for the first time in more than 60 days out of the total population. It is given for 100,000 people and is used to make comparisons between different areas.
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.label: Positivity rate
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.description: The positivity rate is the number of people to have tested positive (RT-PCR and antigen tests) for the first time in more than 60 days out of the total number of people to have tested positive or negative over a given period; and who had not previously tested positive in the previous 60 days.
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.label: Intensive care occupancy
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.description: This indicator reflects the occupancy rates of hospital ICUs, and is expressed as the number of patients with COVID-19 who are currently in ICU out of the total number of ICU beds available prior to the crisis.
keyfigure.nombrecas.label: New cases
keyfigure.nombrecas.description: This indicator, which is only available at a national level, corresponds to the number of confirmed new cases (RT-PCR and antigen tests) over the last 24 hours. Figures reported at the start of the week will often be higher as a result of a drop in testing activity over the weekend.
keyfigure.nombrecasj3.label: Positive cases identified D-3
keyfigure.nombrecasj3.description: This indicator corresponds to the number of new cases (RT-PCR and antigen tests) of COVID-19, recorded by test date, and reflects the situation three days ago. This provides enough time to ensure that the data gives an accurate reflection of the epidemiological situation three days ago.
keyfigure.nouveauxpatientsrea.label: New patients in ICU
keyfigure.nouveauxpatientsrea.descriptio: This is the number of new patients with COVID-19 admitted to ICU over the past 24 hours.
keyfigure.patientsrea.label: Patients in ICU
keyfigure.patientsrea.description: This is the number of patients with COVID-19 currently in ICU.
keyFiguresController.title: Key figures
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.subtitle: You can access key data at a local level by entering your zipcode.
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.alert.sub: Enter a zipcode to get local level information. This zipcode will only be stored on your phone in the app.
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture8: Limit your social contacts (no more than 6)

onboarding.runWithoutBleController.title: Phone not compatible
onboarding.runWithoutBleController.mainM: TousAntiCovid will not be able to detect your "Bluetooth contacts"
Unfortunately, your phone is not fully compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy, which is used to detect your "Bluetooth contacts". However, you can still access the other functions of the app.
If you have not received a QR code, contact a healthcare professional (doctor, nurse, pharmacist, dental surgeon, massage therapist, physiotherapist or midwife), who will be able to give you a 6-character code that will be valid for 1 hour and which can be entered via the TousAntiCovid Pro interface.

attestationsController.title: Forms
The manager of the "TousAntiCovid" app will not use any of the information entered into the form generator.

You may delete all of this information at any time by going to the app and selecting "Settings".
newAttestationController.title: New form
newAttestationController.footer: You can save this information on your phone for your next form. Your personal data will only be stored on the phone used to generate the form, in accordance with the general measures introduced to tackle the COVID-19 pandemic in the context of the state of health emergency. You can delete this data at any time by going to the app and selecting "Settings".
manageDataController.attestationsData.su: This will delete all the data on your phone relating to your forms, including any saved forms and data.
manageDataController.attestationsData.co: Are you sure you want to delete all of the data related to your forms? This cannot be undone.
attestationsController.menu.delete.alert: Are you sure you want to delete this form?
I certify that my journey is related to the following reason authorised by decree n¬∞2020-1310 from 29th October 2020 outlining the general measures introduced to tackle the Covid-19 epidemic in the context of the state of health emergency.

attestationController.footer: You can also get the web version on the website of the Minist√®re de l‚ÄôInt√©rieur :

attestationFieldItemChoiceController.foo: Les personnes souhaitant b√©n√©ficier de l'une de ces exceptions doivent se munir s'il y a lieu, lors de leurs d√©placements hors de leur domicile, d'un document leur permettant de justifier que le d√©placement consid√©r√© entre dans le champ de l'une de ces exceptions.
keyFiguresController.explanation.alert.m:
Indicators are to be interpreted with caution, factoring in testing, the health context and population characteristics (age, population density, risk factors, etc.), as well as the quality of the data and the frequency at which it is collected, analysed as a whole. For more information on the monitoring of the health situation, please consult the weekly epidemiological report on the Public Health France website www.santepubliquefrance.fr
The R number is calculated over a period of 7 days ranging from D-9 to D-3. Data will be collected on Tuesdays and will be published once a week (on Thursdays). An R number is given for both the country as a whole (mainland France) and individual regions (both mainland and overseas regions). All other indicators are updated daily, after being confirmed by Public Health France and the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health. At a national level, data on the incidence rate and the positivity rate will be collected on D-3 and calculated as an average of the last 7 days [D-9; D-3] in order to take any fluctuation into account. Data on new cases will be collected on D-1, meaning this indicator will lack the perspective and context needed to confirm that it is an accurate reflection of the health situation.

sendHistoryController.successAlert.messa:
Thank you for identifying yourself via the TousAntiCovid app and for informing those users you were in close contact with while you were contagious.

Thanks to you, these users will be able to take the necessary precautions in order to protect themselves and others. Let's keep up the fight against Covid.

keyFiguresController.section.health.subt:
‚ö†Ô∏è A partir d‚Äôaujourd‚Äôhui, la semaine glissante d‚Äô√©tude n‚Äôinclut pas le lundi de p√¢ques, et sa comparaison avec les 7 jours pr√©c√©dents, qui inclut le lundi de p√¢ques, est √† faire avec prudence et n‚Äôest pas √† consid√©rer comme une hausse exceptionnelle du nombre de cas.

Tap "read now" to find out more about the source of the health data, how they are interpreted and updated.
home.activation.sick.alert.title: Information
home.activation.sick.alert.message:
The alert for exposure to COVID-19 cannot be activated for 2 months after you declare yourself positive for COVID-19.

For 2 months after testing positive for COVID-19, you will not be considered as being "at-risk of infection".

TousAntiCovid Signal permet d‚Äô√™tre alert√© et d‚Äôalerter les autres en cas d‚Äôexposition √† la COVID-19 dans un lieu que vous avez fr√©quent√©.

Pour cela vous devez scanner le QR Code affich√© √† l‚Äôentr√©e des lieux qui ont mis en place ce dispositif. Si vous √™tes test√© positif √† la COVID-19, n‚Äôoubliez pas de vous d√©clarer positif dans l‚Äôapplication pour informer les autres utilisateurs.

Ce dispositif est anonyme, aucune donn√©e nominative n‚Äôest collect√©e ni sur le lieu ni sur les personnes pr√©sentes. Le nom et l‚Äôadresse du lieu ne sont pas contenus dans le QR Code.

Pour cela vous devez scanner le QR Code affich√© √† l‚Äôentr√©e des lieux qui ont mis en place ce dispositif. Si vous √™tes test√© positif √† la COVID-19, n‚Äôoubliez pas de vous d√©clarer positif dans l‚Äôapplication pour informer les autres utilisateurs.

myHealthController.state.warning.title: You may have been exposed to at least one user who has tested positive for COVID-19 in the past few days
myHealthController.state.warning.subtitl: Keep an eye on your symptoms and contact your doctor if you have any concerns.
venuesPrivateEventController.title: Private event
venuesPrivateEventController.mainMessage: Here is a code for your private event that is valid today

In order for everyone to stay safe anonymously, your guests can scan the QR code using the TousAntiCovid app.
Alternatively, you can share this link with them by pressing "Share".
venuesPrivateEventController.sharing.tex: Everyone will be able to stay safe anonymously using this link:
Limit your contacts and ensure you strictly adhere to social distancing.
myHealthController.step.beCareful.warnin: Pay close attention to the appearance of symptoms
If you are in any doubt, you can go to My Covid Advice and complete the guidance questionnaire, or call your doctor.
notification.atWarning.title: Potential exposure to someone with COVID-19
notification.atWarning.message: In the last few days, you may have come into contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19. If you are a minor, please discuss this with your parents or legal guardians. Tap here for the steps to take.
isolation.recommendation.initialCaseSafe: Self-isolating is an important measure in breaking the chain of transmission.
isolation.recommendation.initialCaseAtRi: Self-isolating is an important measure in breaking the chain of transmission. It is recommended that you adhere to the self-isolation guidelines.
isolation.recommendation.allGood.title: Self-isolation recommended
isolation.recommendation.allGood.body:
If you are fine, there is no need to self-isolate.

Please continue to follow social distancing guidelines
isolation.recommendation.symptoms.title: Self-isolation recommended
isolation.recommendation.symptoms.body:
Self-isolate immediately and seek out the nearest testing centre.

You should also self-isolate while you await the results of your test.
You can stop self-isolating!

Please continue to follow social distancing guidelines
isolation.recommendation.contactCaseUnkn:
Self-isolate for 7 days.

Expected end of self-isolation: %@

Book an appointment to get a test.
isolation.recommendation.contactCaseKnow:
Self-isolate immediately and seek out the nearest testing centre.

You should also self-isolate while you await the results of your test.

Self-isolate for 7 days after the person you share a household with has recovered (no fever for 48 hours).

Expected end of self-isolation: %@

Self-isolate for 7 days after the person you share a household with has recovered (no fever for 48 hours).

Return to this form once you have the recovery date for the person you share a household with.
isolation.recommendation.contactCasePost: For 7 days after you stop self-isolating, please strictly adhere to social distancing guidelines: wear a mask, wash your hands regularly and continue physical distancing. You should also avoid all contact with at-risk individuals.
isolation.recommendation.positiveCaseNoS:
Immediately self-isolate after getting your results and for 10 days after the date of your positive test.

Expected end of self-isolation: %@
isolation.recommendation.positiveCaseSym:
Immediately self-isolate after getting your results and for 10 days after the date on which your symptoms started.

Expected end of self-isolation: %@

At the end of your self-isolation, we will ask you if you still have a fever.

Immediately self-isolate for 10 days after getting your results.

Expected end of self-isolation: %@
isolation.recommendation.positiveCasePos: For 7 days after you stop self-isolating, please strictly adhere to social distancing guidelines: wear a mask, wash your hands regularly and continue physical distancing. You should also avoid all contact with at-risk individuals.
isolation.recommendation.positiveCaseSym: Wait 48 hours after your fever has stopped before exiting self-isolation.
isolation.recommendation.indeterminate.b: Tap here to complete filling out the questionnaire and to get your self-isolation recommendations
isolation.recommendation.symptoms.testin: Where can I get a test?
isolation.recommendation.contactCaseUnkn: Where can I get a test?

I no longer have a fever
notification.stillHavingFever.title: Self-isolating
notification.stillHavingFever.message: Do you still have a fever?
isolation.symptoms.alert.title: Do you have COVID-19 symptoms?
isolation.symptoms.alert.message:
The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are: fever, a cough, headache, a sudden loss of your sense of taste or smell, diarrhoea.

To find out more about your symptoms, we recommend you check out "My Covid Advice".
isolationFormController.title: My status
isolationFormController.contactCase.inde: Do you share a household with anyone who has tested positive for COVID-19?
isolationFormController.contactCase.have: Do you have the date on which the person you share a household with recovered (no fever for 48 hours)?
isolationFormController.contactCase.symp: The recovery date for the person you share a household with:
isolationFormController.positiveCase.sti: The 7 days have elapsed: do you still have a fever?
isolationFormController.footer.title: Please answer all of the questions so that we can make recommendations on the length of your self-isolation.
venuesHistoryController.footer:
Your location history will be used to notify you if someone who has tested positive was in this location.
Locations will be erased automatically after 14 days each time the app is opened.
venuesHistoryController.delete.alert.tit: Do you want to delete this location?
venuesHistoryController.delete.alert.mes: Once it has been deleted, you will not be notified if someone who was at this location at the same time as you is identified as having COVID-19.

manageDataController.isolationData.subti: You can delete self-isolation information from your phone.

Do you want to add this location to your location history?
home.vaccinationSection.cellSubtitle: Check your eligibility and find a center nearby to get vaccinated.
vaccinationController.title: Vaccination
vaccinationController.eligibility.title: Am I eligible to get vaccinated?
vaccinationController.eligibility.subtit:
Aujourd‚Äôhui, les publics prioritaires d√©finis par les autorit√©s sanitaires sont :
- les personnes de 55 ans et plus, quels que soient leur lieu de vie et leur √©tat de sant√© (avec ou sans comorbidit√©s)
- les femmes enceintes √† partir du deuxi√®me trimestre de la grossesse ;
- les r√©sidents en √©tablissements (par exemple Ehpad, USLD)
- les personnes de plus de 18 ans ayant une pathologie qui les expose √† un tr√®s haut risque face √† la Covid-19 ;
- les personnes de 50 √† 54 ans inclus, souffrant d‚Äôune ou plusieurs comorbidit√©s
- les personnes en situation de handicap h√©berg√©es en √©tablissements
- les r√©sidents de 60 ans et plus dans les foyers de travailleurs migrants
- les professionnels du secteur de la sant√© et du secteur m√©dico-social appartenant aux cat√©gories prioritaires.

Appuyez sur "En savoir plus" pour plus de d√©tails.
vaccinationController.vaccinationLocatio: Find a center to get vaccinated
Go to www.Sant√©.fr to find vaccination centers.
keyfigure.nombrevaccinations.label: Total number of vaccinated people
keyfigure.nombrevaccinations.description:
This indicator represents the total number of people vaccinated for the first time (people who received a first injection).

The data are consolidated the day after they are reported to take into account the latest vaccination data from the night before.
enterCodeController.alert.expiredCode.me: Your presence in this place dates back more than 14 days. It is therefore no longer useful from a health point of view to add it to your history.
keyfigure.nombrecas.learnMore:
Data reported at the start of the week are often lower due to a decrease in screening activities at weekends.

This indicator is only available at the national level; it is very sensitive to the daily variations in screening activities which are reported to Sant√© publique France and does not constitute a good snapshot of the health situation.
home.activationExplanation.title: Attention
home.activationExplanation.message: As your phone does not fully support Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), TousAntiCovid will restart your phone's Bluetooth frequently enough to function properly.
keyfigure.nombrevaccinations.learnMore:
The cumulative number of people vaccinated in France is obtained daily via the "Vaccin Covid" platform in which the number of people vaccinated is recorded directly.

The data are then consolidated by Sant√© publique France and then published on data.gouv.

Data are available at regional and national levels on a daily basis.
vaccinationController.vaccinationLocatio: If you cannot find a vaccination center that suits you, find all the centers on Sant√©.fr
vaccinationCenterCell.openingDate.title: Timetable
vaccinationController.vaccinationLocatio: With a zipcode, the application will give you a list of the %d vaccination centers closest to that zipcode.
error.cryptoIssue.explanation.title: Security
error.cryptoIssue.explanation.message: For security reasons, it is necessary to register again. If you are not up to date, it is necessary to install the latest version of TousAntiCovid now.
proximityController.error.noAdvertising: Your phone does not have Bluetooth advertising, unfortunately it is not compatible with alerting people contacted via Bluetooth.
keyfigure.tauxincidence.learnMore:
Le taux d‚Äôincidence est arr√™t√© √† J-3 et calcul√© sur la somme du nombre de nouvelles personnes test√©es positives des 7 derniers jours [J-9 ; J-3] afin de mieux prendre en compte la fluctuation de remont√©e des donn√©es.

Il est exprim√© pour 100 000 habitants et permet de comparer des zones g√©ographiques entre elles.

Le taux d‚Äôincidence est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau d√©partemental (d√©partements m√©tropolitains et ultra-marins) et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.learnMore:
Le taux de positivit√© est arr√™t√© √† J-3 et calcul√© sur la moyenne des 7 derniers jours [J-9 ; J-3] afin de mieux prendre en compte la fluctuation de remont√©e des donn√©es.

Le taux de positivit√© est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau d√©partemental (d√©partements m√©tropolitains et ultra-marins) et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.learnMore:
Cet indicateur de tension des r√©animations informe sur la situation de la veille.

Il est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau r√©gional (r√©gions m√©tropolitaines et ultra-marines) et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.

Cet indicateur est plus pertinent au niveau r√©gional que d√©partemental en raison des disparit√©s de pr√©sence d‚Äôh√¥pitaux et de services de r√©animation au sein des diff√©rents d√©partements.
keyfigure.nombrecasj3.learnMore:
L‚Äôindicateur informe sur la situation d‚Äôil y a trois jours (J-3).

Cet indicateur est similaire √† "Nouveaux cas rapport√©s J-1" mais permet de b√©n√©ficier de suffisamment de temps pour que les donn√©es sur les tests remontent et qu‚Äôelles refl√®tent correctement la situation √©pid√©miologique d'il y a trois jours.

Cet indicateur est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau d√©partemental (d√©partements m√©tropolitains et ultra-marins), et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.

La courbe de la moyenne glissante des nouveaux cas sur 7 jours permet de pr√©senter la tendance en "lissant" par exemple les effets du week-end o√π les donn√©es remontent moins.
keyfigure.nouveauxpatientsrea.learnMore:
Cet indicateur informe sur la situation de la veille.

Il est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau r√©gional (r√©gions m√©tropolitaines et ultra-marines) et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.

Cet indicateur est plus pertinent au niveau r√©gional que d√©partemental en raison des disparit√©s de pr√©sence d‚Äôh√¥pitaux et de services de r√©animation au sein des diff√©rents d√©partements.
keyfigure.patientsrea.learnMore:
Cet indicateur informe sur la situation en r√©animation de la veille.

Il est disponible au niveau national (France m√©tropolitaine) et au niveau r√©gional (r√©gions m√©tropolitaines et ultra-marines) et mis √† jour quotidiennement, apr√®s consolidation par SpF et le Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.

Cet indicateur est plus pertinent au niveau r√©gional que d√©partemental en raison des disparit√©s de pr√©sence d‚Äôh√¥pitaux et de services de r√©animation au sein des diff√©rents d√©partements.
notification.lowRisk.title: Info: stay alert
notification.lowRisk.message: Stay alert, you regularly meet positive and contagious people. Continue to apply the preventive measures!
notification.atHighWarning.title: Alert: exposure in a place
notification.atHighWarning.message: You were in the same place or event as at least one user who tested positive for COVID-19 and was contagious in the past few days. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
manageDataController.hideStatus.title: My risk status
manageDataController.hideStatus.subtitle: You can hide your risk status on the home screen of the application. To unhide it, you will have to change the configuration below.
risk.section.measures.title: The preventive measures
risk.section.measures.body: Be sure to follow the preventive measures to stop the spread of the virus.
risk.section.mcc.title: Mes Conseils Covid
risk.section.mcc.body:
Find personalized advice on prevention and care on the Mes Conseils Covid website.

Mes Conseils Covid is a service of the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©
risk.section.limit.title: Limit your contacts
risk.section.limit.body: Be sure to limit your contact, in particular with people at risk of severe disease.
risk.section.test.title: Get tested
risk.section.test.body:
You have priority access to the test. It is recommended that you get tested immediately and 7 days after your contact date.

To find out which day is the most suitable for you to be tested according to your situation, update your status in the "Isolation recommendation" module.

Contact your doctor in case of doubt.

If you do not have a doctor, call 0 800 130 000 to be referred to a doctor (free service + free call).
risk0.section.test.title: Where to get tested
risk0.section.test.body: To find out where to get tested, go to Sant√©.fr
risk.section.symptoms.title: In case of symptoms
risk.section.symptoms.body:
If in doubt, do not hesitate to complete the orientation questionnaire on Mes Conseils Covid or call your doctor.

If you have symptoms compatible with COVID-19, you can also update your status in the "Isolation recommendation" module, in order to know if your isolation period should be updated.
risk.section.isolate.title: Isolate yourself
risk.section.isolate.body:
To calculate the needed duration of isolation according to your situation and to protect others, you can go to the "Isolation recommendation" module.

You can benefit from a sick leave with the Assurance Maladie.

Be sure to limit your contacts, especially with people at risk of severe disease. Be extremely vigilant about strict compliance with preventive measures.
risk0.home.title: No at-risk exposure detected
risk0.home.sub: Tap for advice, where to get tested and more
risk0.details.title: No at-risk exposure detected
risk0.widget.longTitle: No at-risk exposure detected. Tap for advice, where to get tested and more
risk0.details.sub: However, do not forget the preventive measures and health recommendations
risk0.section1.title: Your risk
risk0.section1.body:
You have not been near a user who tested positive and contagious.

You will be notified if you have been in the vicinity (estimated distance to be within two meters) of a user declared to be a case of COVID-19.

Your status in the app is checked approximately every 24 hours.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations of Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
risk1.notif.title: Info: stay alert
risk1.notif.sub: You are regularly in contact with positive and contagious people. Check out our recommendations.
risk1.home.title: Stay alert
risk1.home.sub: You are regularly in contact with positive and contagious people üëâ
risk1.details.title: No at-risk exposure detected, but stay alert
risk1.details.sub: Do not forget the preventive measures and health recommendations
risk1.section1.title: Your risk
risk1.section1.body:
You have not been near a user who tested positive and contagious, but you regularly come across positive and contagious people.

You will be notified if you have been nearby (estimated distance to be less than two meters) or in the same at-risk location as a user declared as a case of COVID-19.

Your status in the app is checked approximately every 24 hours.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations of the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
risk2.notif.title: Info: place at risk
risk2.notif.sub: You have been exposed to a moderate risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians
risk2.home.title: Info place: moderate risk of contamination
risk2.details.title: You went to a place with a moderate risk of contamination
risk2.details.sub: Get tested and apply the preventive measures!
risk2.section1.title: Your risk
risk2.section1.body:
You have been exposed to a moderate risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person who has declared themselves positive in the application.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have any doubts, particularly about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in a place with a moderate risk of contamination.
risk3.notif.title: Alert: place at risk
risk3.notif.sub: You have been exposed to a high risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
risk3.home.title: Alert: high exposure risk in a place
risk3.details.title: You have been in a place with a high risk of contamination: you are a at-risk contact person
risk3.section1.title: Your risk
risk3.section1.body:
You have been exposed to a high risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person who has tested positive in the application. You are a at-risk contact person.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have any doubts, particularly about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in a place with a moderate risk of contamination.
risk4.notif.title: Alert: at-risk exposure
risk4.notif.sub: You have been exposed to at least one user who tested positive and contagious. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
risk4.home.title: Alert: high risk exposure following contact
risk4.details.title: Risk exposure following a contact: you are a at-risk contact person
risk4.section1.title: Your risk
risk4.section1.body:
You have been exposed to at least one user who has tested positive and contagious. You are a at-risk contact person.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have the slightest doubt about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in the vicinity of at least one user who tested positive and contagious.
myHealthController.workStopping.title: Sick leave
myHealthController.workStopping.message:
You have here a one-time link which allows you to make a "sick leave" request on declare.ameli.fr, for 7 days only after the contact date.
You can make this request from your smartphone, or you can send you this link to make the request on your computer.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.label: Reason between 7pm & 6am
attestation.form.reason_curfew.travail.s: 1. Professional occupation, education and training, general interest mission
attestation.form.reason_curfew.travail.l:
- Travel between the home and the place of work, education or training.
- Business travel that cannot be postponed, deliveries.
- Travel to make purchases of supplies required for my professional occupation.
- Travel to participate in missions of general interest at the request of the administrative authority.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.sante.lon: Travel for consultations, examinations/check-ups, preventive procedures (including vaccination) and care/treatment that cannot be provided remotely, or to buy health products.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.famille.s: 3. Compelling family reason, assistance to vulnerable people, childcare, disability
attestation.form.reason_curfew.famille.l:
- Travel for a compelling family reason, for assistance to vulnerable or needy people, or childcare.
- Travel of people with disabilities and their carers.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.convocati: 4. Judicial or administrative summons, procedures that cannot be carried out remotely
Travel to respond to a judicial or administrative summons, travel to visit a public service or a legal professional for formalities or proceedings that cannot be carried out remotely.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.animaux.s: 5. Pet animals in the evening and at night
attestation.form.reason_curfew.animaux.l: Short outings for the needs of pet animals (within a radius of 1 kilometre around the home).
üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants

üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_curfew.transit.s: 7. D√©placements de transit et longue distance
attestation.form.reason_curfew.transit.l: üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_curfew.title: Between 7pm & 6am
attestation.form.reason_curfew.header: I am travelling between 7pm & 6am for one of the following reasons:
attestation.form.reason_curfew.footer: People wishing to benefit from one of these exceptions must bring, if necessary, when traveling outside their home, a document allowing them to justify that the trip in question falls within the scope of one of these exceptions.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.label: Reason between 6am & 7pm
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.travail: 1. Professional occupation, education and training, general interest mission

- Travel between the home and the place of work, education or training.
- Business travel that cannot be postponed, deliveries.
- Travel to make purchases of supplies required for my professional occupation.
- Travel to participate in missions of general interest at the request of the administrative authority.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.sante.l: Travel for consultations, examinations/check-ups, preventive procedures (including vaccination) and care/treatment that cannot be provided remotely, or to buy health products.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.famille: 3. Compelling family reason, assistance to vulnerable people, childcare, disability

- Travel for a compelling family reason, for assistance to vulnerable or needy people, or childcare.
- Travel of people with disabilities and their carers.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.convoca: 4. Judicial or administrative summons, procedures that cannot be carried out remotely
Travel to respond to a judicial or administrative summons, travel to visit a public service or a legal professional for formalities or proceedings that cannot be carried out remotely.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.demenag:
- Travel connected to moving home resulting from a change of home address.
- Travel which is essential for the purchase or rental of a main residence that cannot be postponed.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.achats_: 6. Purchases, cultural establishments or places of worship (within my department [1])

- Travel for purchases of basic necessities, to collect orders or to benefit from services.
- Travel to visit a cultural establishment that is open or a place of worship.
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.sport.s: 7. Physical and open-air activities, walking (within a radius of 10 kilometres around your home)
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.sport.l:
- Travel connected to walking, individual physical activities, open-air activities and the needs of pet animals.
üëâ You should only complete the certificate for this reason if you are unable to present proof of address.
üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.enfants: üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.culte_c: 4. Etablissement culturel ou lieu de culte
üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.demarch: üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.handica: üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.judicia: üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.transit: 12. D√©placement de transit vers les gares et les a√©roports
üôÇ Mise √† jour en cours, merci de relancer l'app dans quelques instants
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.title: Between 6am & 7pm
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.header: I am travelling between 6am & 7pm for one of the following reasons:
attestation.form.reason_lockdown.footer:
People wishing to benefit from one of these exceptions must bring, if necessary, when traveling outside their home, a document allowing them to justify that the trip in question falls within the scope of one of these exceptions.

[1] For persons residing near the boundary of a department, a distance of 30 kilometres beyond the department boundary is accepted.
walletController.title: Test wallet
walletController.explanations.title: How does it work?
walletController.explanations.subtitle:
To digitalize your test certificates and always have them at hand, it's simple: once the result of your test is available, you will receive a text message with a link and instructions to follow.

This certificate will have to be presented during checks for your air travels üëâ experiment in progress, only on some flights to Corsica (Air France and Air Corsica will inform their eligible customers).

If you have a problem, you can call 0 800 08 71 48.
walletController.flashButton.title: Scan QR Code
walletController.flashExplanation: On your your SIDEP document with your test results, you have a QR Code that you can scan to add your certificate in this wallet.

These certificates are more than 3 days old.
